messages.content: Alex has given us a strong voice in Parliament. Let's send him back to continue the job. This is a critical election. Nine years of austerity, cuts to our local services, have devastated our community. The Tories cut police officers, so now we see crime rising. They cut nurses and funds for the Doctor. They cut youth services, the very people there to help young people do better. Alex has always done that and is the only candidate that has a strong local record. Lives here and we can win.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will not allow our NHS to be sold off. It’s a public resource for all of us. Labour will properly fund it so that we can all access it when we need it.
Social care has been devastated by cuts. Labour would reverse these, introduce free personal care, protect the free TV licence and protect the bus pass.
A Labour Government would restore youth services cut by this Government. I will fight against school cuts, for better job training and access to housing.
Labour has invested in Bulwell Market and Labour would fund planning improvements to Bulwell Town Centre, protect jobs, and fund a new supported town of shops.
We need significant climate action. A Labour Government will not outsource carbon emissions but develop a green economy leading to new jobs in manufacturing.

issues.education: MORE FOR YOUNGER PEOPLE: A Labour Government would restore youth services cut by this Government. I will fight against school cuts, for better job training and access to housing.
issues.environment: FIGHT CLIMATE CHANGE: We need significant climate action. A Labour Government will not outsource carbon emissions but develop a green economy leading to new jobs in manufacturing.
issues.health: SAVE OUR NHS: We will not allow our NHS to be sold off. It’s a public resource for all of us. Labour will properly fund it so that we can all access it when we need it.
issues.labourEmployment: STAND UP FOR OLDER PEOPLE: Social care has been devastated by cuts. Labour would reverse these, introduce free personal care, protect the free TV licence and protect the bus pass.
issues.lawCrime: The Tories cut police officers, so now we see crime rising.
issues.socialWelfare: STAND UP FOR OLDER PEOPLE: Social care has been devastated by cuts. Labour would reverse these, introduce free personal care, protect the free TV licence and protect the bus pass.

community.content: IMPROVE OUR SHOPS: Labour has invested in Bulwell Market and Labour would fund planning improvements to Bulwell Town Centre, protect jobs, and fund a new supported town of shops.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in Basford and have worked for years to improve our area. I started with a successful campaign to save Bulwell Chill (Ice) Centre, I’ve been a school governor for a decade and a regular MP.

politicalExperience.achievements: I’ve stood up in Parliament against funding for social care, fighting for our police, fighting for things for young people that’s been cut so badly.

images.caption: Alex launches his campaign with his team of local people
